name: Lost in another universe (Markal (Magical cat Lv20))
name_original: Lost in another universe (Markal (Magical cat Lv20))
description:
" GAME STILL IN THE DEMO STAGE !!! "

Working in an office is complicated, even more so when you are lost in another universe.

You are an exemplary and determined employee of the Big Move Company, but one day you wake up in an office you don't recognize. Here you are with the position of the manager of human resources in the Company, a huge corporation located in Merville in another universe. Lost and disoriented, you will have to find the reason of your arrival as well as a way to return home. However your mission will not be easy between your work, the various people that you will have to deal with on a daily basis and the mysteries and dangers that lurk in the Company and in this new world...

The twitter for more news : https://twitter.com/MarkalVortex

Game made with Ren'Py
